headline: CoreWeave & Core Scientific, Nvidia, Groq: Trending Tickers
summary: CoreWeave (CRWV) stock is under pressure after the company announced it will acquire data center provider Core Scientific (CORZ) in an all-stock transaction valued at $9 billion. Core Scientific stock is plunging on the news. Citi analysts raised their price target for Nvidia (NVDA) to $190 per share, highlighting the opportunity for the artificial intelligence (AI) chipmaker as sovereign AI demand intensifies. Groq (GROQ.PVT) announced its first European data center in partnership with Equinix (EQIX). Check out Yahoo Finance Executive Editor Brian Sozzi's interview with Groq founder and CEO Jonathan Ross here. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts here.

content.title: CoreWeave & Core Scientific, Nvidia, Groq: Trending Tickers
content.description:
CoreWeave (CRWV) stock is under pressure after the company announced it will acquire data center provider Core Scientific (CORZ) in an all-stock transaction valued at $9 billion. Core Scientific stock is plunging on the news.

Citi analysts raised their price target for Nvidia (NVDA) to $190 per share, highlighting the opportunity for the artificial intelligence (AI) chipmaker as sovereign AI demand intensifies.

Groq (GROQ.PVT) announced its first European data center in partnership with Equinix (EQIX). Check out Yahoo Finance Executive Editor Brian Sozzi's interview with Groq founder and CEO Jonathan Ross here.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts here.

headline: Singapore Existing & Upcoming Data Center Database 2025: Comprehensive Analysis of 47 Existing and 5 Upcoming Facilities
summary: Discover comprehensive insights into the Singapore data center market. This Excel-based product offers detailed assessments of 47 existing and 5 upcoming data centers in Eastern, Southern, and Northern Singapore. It includes data on white-floor space, IT load capacities, retail and wholesale colocation pricing, and rack cabinet options. Key highlights project over 120 MW of power capacity and 13,550 rack spaces by 2030. Covered operators include Equinix, AirTrunk, and Global Switch. Ideal for RE

headline: Groq launches its first European data centre in Helsinki
summary: The new site will enable businesses across Europe to access AI inferencing capabilities via Equinix’s infrastructure.

content.title: Groq launches its first European data centre in Helsinki
content.summary: The new site will enable businesses across Europe to access AI inferencing capabilities via Equinix’s infrastructure.

thumbnail.caption: The Helsinki data center joins Groq's existing hub in Dammam

headline: Groq Launches European Data Center Footprint in Helsinki, Finland
summary: Groq, a global pioneer in AI inference, today announced the continued expansion of its global data center network, establishing its first European data center footprint in Helsinki, Finland to meet the growing demands of European customers. Groq is a leading AI inference provider, delivering the capacity and low cost that production AI workloads demand, so customers can move fast and keep their advantage in the changing AI landscape.

content.title: Groq Launches European Data Center Footprint in Helsinki, Finland
content.summary: Groq, a global pioneer in AI inference, today announced the continued expansion of its global data center network, establishing its first European data center footprint in Helsinki, Finland to meet the growing demands of European customers. Groq is a leading AI inference provider, delivering the capacity and low cost that production AI workloads demand, so customers can move fast and keep their advantage in the changing AI landscape.

thumbnail.caption: Groq's new European footprint, established in collaboration with Equinix in Helsinki, Finland, brings AI inference capacity closer to users across Europe, meaning lower latency, faster response times at scale, and strong data governance.
